Subject: Call this week 
Gloria, 
Would you have time for a call with the SONY Epstein team tomorrow or Friday? We would like to provide you with a 
bit of an update and discuss some of your clients in particular. 
Hope you are staying safe and healthy. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
I  St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007
